data.title: DePIN gaming infrastructure Beamable completes $13.5 million Series A financing, led by Bitkraft Ventures
data.description: DePIN gaming infrastructure platform Beamable completes $13.5 million Series A funding, led by Bitkraft Ventures. Beamable Network aims to change the way gaming backend infrastructure is built and operated. (The Block)

data.title: Crypto.com to Submit Cronos ETF Application and Issue New Stablecoin
data.description: Crypto.com released its 2025 roadmap, plans to submit an ETF application for its platform token Cronos in the fourth quarter, and plans to launch a new stablecoin in the third quarter. Crypto.com has previously obtained a MiCA license to provide cryptocurrency services in Europe. (Cointelegraph)

data.title: Ionic Platform Faces Security Breach Involving Fake LBTC
data.description: According to Odaily, the Ionic platform, which operates on Mode, has been targeted by hackers. The attackers exploited a counterfeit version of LBTC (Lombard BTC) as collateral on the Ionic platform. The team is currently investigating the incident. Users are advised to refrain from interacting with the platform until further notice.

data.title: Crypto AI agent platform Olas receives $13.8 million in funding, led by 1kx
data.description: Olas, an autonomous AI agent platform in cryptocurrency, has raised $13.8 million to support the launch of its "agent app store" called Pearl. This round of financing was led by 1kx, with participation from Tioga Capital, Sigil Fund, Zee Prime Capital, Borderless, Keyrock and other institutions. The Olas team, also known as Autonolas, said the funds will be used to support its agent app store, which aims to democratize user-owned AI agents. The app store will let users own and control their AI agents directly on-chain for a variety of use cases, such as autonomous social media accounts or DeFi transactions.

data.title: Republican Senator Introduces Bill to Regulate Stablecoins—What You Need to Know
data.description:
TL;DR Senator Bill Hagerty seeks to establish a favorable regulatory framework for stablecoins in the U.S. The proposal requires stablecoins to be backed by dollars, Treasury bonds, and Federal Reserve notes.  The project aims to position the U.S. as the global epicenter of crypto-innovation by establishing a clear and transparent infrastructure for the development of ... 
source: https://crypto-economy.com/republican-senator-introduces-bill-to-regulate-stablecoins-what-you-need-to-know/

data.title: Crypto.com plans to file Cronos ETF, launch stablecoin in 2025
data.description:
The cryptocurrency exchange recently secured a MiCA license, allowing it to provide services throughout the European Economic Area.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/crypto-com-cronos-etf-launch-stablecoin-2025?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: Ionic platform on Mode attacked, hackers used fake LBTC as collateral
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News According to the official announcement of Ionic, the Mode-based Ionic platform was hacked, and the hacker used unofficial fake LBTC (Lombard BTC) as collateral for the Ionic platform. The team is investigating, and Odaily reminds users not to interact with it.
The original link is attached with the official LBTC contract address query.

data.title: FTX Repayments Begin February 18, Claims Under $50,000 Eligible
data.description:
FTX announces distributions for Convenience Class claims under $50,000 starting Feb 18, 2025. Funds include adjudicated claim value + 9% interest.

source: https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/25/02/43469427/ftx-repayments-begin-february-18-claims-under-50000-eligible?utm_source=cryptopanic.com&utm_campaign=partner_feed&utm_medium=partner_feed&utm_content=site

data.title: Billionaires Shift from Nvidia to Bitcoin, Eyeing Long-Term Gains
data.description:
Over the past five years, Nvidia has seen incredible growth, with its stock price soaring by over 2,000%.
The post Billionaires Shift from Nvidia to Bitcoin, Eyeing Long-Term Gains appeared first on Cryptodnes.
source: https://cryptodnes.bg/en/billionaires-shift-from-nvidia-to-bitcoin-eyeing-long-term-gains/
